As you browse through this website, you will be able to find the different classes and programs details that Monkey Tree has to offer. We hope you will take the time to personally visit our nursery and play center in order to get a first hand experience of what Monkey Tree is truly about.

Mission

To develop innovative, creative, and collaborative learners who will cultivate a passion for lifelong learning.

Vision

Monkey Tree is recognized for developing passionate learners who are able to think creatively, communicate effectively, and collaborate efficiently while still knowing how to have fun. Our curriculum, teaching staff, and learning environment will show excellence, dedication, and integrity.

Learning

Monkey Tree’s curriculum is designed to help our students learn and grow through play, stimulate and enhance motoric skills through singing and dancing, and develop academically through the introduction of letters, numbers, and colors.

Monkey Tree’s aim is also to help students develop academically. We create lesson plans that are based on inquiry that will shape students to think further. Students will improve their critical thinking skills, communication skills, and their perspective on things.

We provide children with learning opportunities whenever possible and this includes learning through playtime. Playtime allows children to learn how to play cooperatively with others and how to share toys and common space with one another.

Arts and crafts are also activities that students will enjoy. Through arts and crafts, we will teach our students who to express their emotions and how to showcase their creativity at the same time.

Dancing and singing is healthy and fun for out students. They will be able to actively exercise with their classmates while learning new songs and dance moves in different languages while stimulating their motoric skills.

The learning space is one of the most important aspects in childhood education. Our halls and classrooms are designed in a way that will inspire and support children’s learning process by creating an atmosphere that supports the children’s curiosity and developmental needs. It is designed to make our students feel safe and comfortable.

You will see that our programs, learning spaces, and teaching staff are fully geared to nurture in each child a passion for learning and the skills and knowledge needed for success in the elementary years ahead.

Please browse through our “Student Life” section for program descriptions and our class schedule.

Program

Monkey Tree offers two programs, the Jungle class and the Forest class, that is a mix of fun and educational for our students.

Jungle Class

This class provides activities for children aged 6 months to 4 years old. The Jungle Class program builds children confidence and stimulate children motoric skill by playing, singing and dancing. We have 3 levels for the Jungle Class:

- Infant for 6 Months to Walking
- Jumping for Walking to 2 Years
- Swinging for 2 Years to 4 Years

Forest Class

This class provides activities for children aged 16 months to 4 years old. The Forest Class program encourages children to be more independent and support their knowledge by learning numbers, colors and letters. We have 2 levels for Forest Class:

- Banana for 16 Months to 2 Years
- Apple for 2 Years to 4 Years
